html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1990-25221990-11-220,  ,  OLD INAC,  , 
PrecisOrder which provides for: (a) the acceptance of an Instrument approved by the BLOOD BAND OF INDIANS which provides for (i) the revocation of two previous instruments approved in 1947 (P.C. 1948-597) and in 1956 (P.C. 1956-661) which surrendered certain lands on Blood Indian Reserve No. 148, in the Province of Alberta, and (ii) will return the land so surrendered to reserve status; and (b) consents to the exercise by the Province of Alberta of its powers to take lands under the Water Resources Act of Alberta without the consent of the owners.
Attachments
